name: Burning Down
description:
Rescue people from the blazing building!

This is my entry for Lurum Dare 49. The theme was "Unstable" so I made a game based on a burning house that can collapse at any moment. There's people stuck inside there and you gotta help them!

All assets (excluding sound effects) were made by me! And I made this game from ground up all by myself, using Unity as the engine! It was tough because I had zero experience with game jams (even going for the Jam category) and I didn't really know much about Unity (I joined this jam just to learn it), but I feel like I've learned a lot with this little project!

(PS: I'm not sure if this game works on all platforms, but it works on Windows, that's for sure. Could someone tell me if it also works on Mac or Linux?)
